PHRASE.LANG: A kagami mochi (a kind of rice cake) that is put up as an offering during Japanese New Year to pray for good luck for the coming year.

お正月に、新年の幸を願って供えられる鏡餅です。
일본에서 정월 초하루에 복이 깃들기를 바라며,\n장식해놓는 카가미모찌입니다.
A kagami mochi (a kind of rice cake) that is put up as an offering during Japanese New Year to pray for good luck for the coming year.
於日本新年時供奉、祈求新的一年一切順利的鏡餅。
